name: Take this EVERYBODY Loves Raymond Quiz! Average Trivia | Television

questions.explanation:
Albert.

	You find this out in the episode when Debra finds a tape from Ray's answering machine from 1982. Marie keeps leaving messages on the machine, but when Ray neglects to call her back, she leaves a message that says "Raymond Albert Barone! Pick up the phone right now!"

questions.text: On the morning of his big FBI job interview, what does Marie do to Robert's lucky suit?
questions.correct: She burns it with an iron
options: She rips it when she's taking the hem down
She spills cranberry juice on it
She forgets to pick it up from the dry-cleaners in time
questions.explanation:
She burns it with an iron.

	Marie was ironing Robert's suit jacket and watching TV at the same time. Then there was a commercial for a sports programme that Ray was going to be on. Marie got distracted and left a huge burn mark on the back of his suit jacket. She tried to get Robert to wear a trench coat over it, but he had to change his suit.

questions.text: When Debra was choking on an orange slice, what did Ray do?
questions.correct: He turned up the TV volume
options: He gave her the Heimlich maneuver
questions.explanation:
He turned up the TV volume.

	Ray didn't even realize that she was actually choking, and when she finally swallowed it, she got really mad at him, because she could have died, and he didn't do a thing to help her. Later, Robert showed Debra how to perform the Heimlich maneuver on herself in case that ever happened again.

questions.text: What is Amy's last name before she marries Robert?
questions.explanation:
MacDougal.

	Robert, Amy, her wacko brother Peter, her religious parents. . . hmm, I see spin-off potential here!

In Italy.

	Unfortunately, Stefania's father, Marco, wasn't too keen on Robert.

questions.text: What name does Debra often call Ray?
questions.explanation:
Idiot.

	Ray can be pretty insensitive sometimes, but sometimes he's the only one with any sanity at that house.

questions.text: What was the name of Debra's old boyfriend from tenth grade who wrote her a poem?
questions.explanation:
Chad.

	It was a very romantic poem called "Debra's Eyes". To compete with Chad, Ray wrote a poem called "Debra's Ears", and featured such romantic lines as "They hold thine sunglasses up" and "There's no bone in there; it's cartilage."

Katherine Helmond.

	Katherine Helmond starred in the late 80's/early 90's sitcom "Who's the Boss" as Mona Robinson, with Judith Light, "Charmed"'s Alyssa Milano, and Tony Danza.

Michael and Geoffrey.

	These kids are exactly identical, and the only way you can tell them apart is by the "freckle patterns."

questions.text: What did Debra and Ray eat at their first meal together?
questions.explanation:
Lemon chicken.

	Ray came to Debra's apartment to fix the futon that he'd delivered a couple days before, and Debra "accidentally" made too much lemon chicken, so they ended up eating together (and making out. . .). Thanks for playing my quiz :).
